data.title: NEWTON'S CRADLE
data.meta_description: Newton's Cradle is a classic desktop toy that has stayed popular through the ages. When a ball at one end is lifted and dropped, the middle balls remain still as the ball at the opposite end swings out the same distance, demonstrating Newton's laws of conservation of momentum and energy. Sleek and stylish in appearance
data.text:
Shipping

The Science Store is happy to offer shipping for a flat rate of $10.00 per order in British Columbia, $15.00 per order for other provinces and territories, and FREE shipping for all orders over $75.00 Canada-wide. We are pleased to be able to ship domestically across Canada.

Please Note: We are currently not shipping outside Canada.

All online orders are shipped through Canada Post unless curbside pickup is selected during checkout. Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a shipping notification email. We will be shipping orders within 2 business days of your order confirmation email.

Typical shipping times with Canada Post are between 3-7 business days, depending on the final shipping destination. We thank you for your patience during this time with any delays that may occur once your order has left our facility.

We believe that now, more than ever, the world needs people who care about science. Help us fund the future and next generation of problem solvers, wonder seekers, world changers and nerds.

For additional information on our shipping policy or general inquiries, please visit our FAQs.

Returns/Exchanges

We will gladly exchange or refund any unopened or defective merchandise within 30 days with a valid receipt. In order to qualify for a refund, your items must be in their original packaging, unopened, and in the same condition in which you received them.

Items exempt from refunds are:

Face masks (if opened)

Socks (if opened)

Gift cards

Sale items

In order to complete a refund, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.Payment will be returned on the same card used to purchase the item. Please do not send your returned purchase back to the original manufacturer.

Situations where a partial refund may be given:

Book with damage or sign of use

Any item not in its original condition

Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

REFUNDS

Once your item has been received and inspected by our staff, we will send you an email notification letting you know if your refund has been approved, partially approved or rejected.

If approved, or partially approved, your refund will be processed through the original method of payment. Typically refunds will appear on your bank statement 3-5 business days after refund confirmation.

LATE OR MISSING REFUNDS

After you have received an email confirming your payment was refunded, it will take approximately 3 – 5 business days for the refund to show up on your statement, depending on province or territory.

If after 5 days you haven’t received your refund, contact your credit card company to see if the refund has been authorized.

If they have no record of the refund, please contact us and a staff member will be able to assist you.

EXCHANGES

We will replace items that are defective or significantly damaged in transit. If you require an exchange, please contact us directly at shop@scienceworld.ca with your order confirmation, which item to replace and why. Once approved, you’ll be able to send us the item at:

Science Store

1455 Quebec Street, V6A 3Z7

Vancouver, BC, Canada

For damaged or defective items, we’ll deduct shipping costs for returns/exchanges. Otherwise, you will be responsible for paying shipping costs. Shipping costs are non-refundable.

The time it will take for your exchanged product to reach you will depend on where you live. You can track your order via Canada Post once we send the replaced item.

We do not guarantee that we will receive your returned item.
